storyInfo: Yato wants to find a new place for her old blade, and finds it on Rhodes Island.

attributes.content: Um... Hello, Yato, ma'am.
attributes.name: Intern Operator A

attributes.content: ...Hello.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Hold on, you... you know me?
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Y-Yes. I've studied Team A4's combat reports...
attributes.name: Intern Operator A

attributes.content: Oh. And you are?
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: I'm Mandy, ma'am.
attributes.name: Intern Operator A

attributes.content: I haven't seen you around before... a new recruit?
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Yes! I arrived in March, passed the field operator assessments, and am currently enrolled in the Guard Operator course!
attributes.name: Intern Operator A

attributes.content: A Guard Operator... Do you know how to wield a blade?
attributes.name: Yato
Intern Operator A
attributes.content: I learned a little, but why do you ask—

attributes.name: Intern Operator A
attributes.content: Ah!
Take this.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: This blade... It's the one you always carry.
attributes.name: Intern Operator A

attributes.content: Wield it, and let's have a match to see how strong you are.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Whoa?! I—How could I? I'm definitely nowhere near the level to spar with you.
attributes.name: Intern Operator A

attributes.content: No need to belittle yourself. Use all your strength, and I'll make my own judgement.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Yato, wait!
attributes.name: Rangers

attributes.content: Old man Rangers. Since you're here, help me observe—
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Enough teasing the kid. They have classes soon.
attributes.name: Rangers

attributes.content: Fine... I'm sorry.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: It's alright. Then, I'll be...
attributes.name: Intern Operator A

attributes.content: Yes, yes. Go do your own thing.
attributes.name: Rangers

attributes.content: I have to say, Yato, I keep seeing you on the hunt for rookies recently. You should really give these youngsters a break. They wouldn't even last two moves against you.
attributes.name: Rangers

attributes.content: That so? I don't remember being that weak when I first came to Rhodes Island... Or at least, I could spar with the veterans for more than two moves.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: That was a long time ago. We didn't have as many people as we do now, and we all started working as soon as we arrived.
attributes.name: Rangers

attributes.content: Times have changed. Now it's popular to train the newcomers, consolidate their fundamentals, and then, how do you put it... Oh, yes. Help them integrate into their work environment.
attributes.name: Rangers

attributes.content: They even have a three-legged skating competition these days. It's enough to make an old man jealous.
attributes.name: Rangers

attributes.content: I see. Apparently I haven't kept myself informed on our training policies.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: It's not really something you need to be informed about. Care for a can of soda?
attributes.name: Rangers

attributes.content: (Catches can)
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Then again, passing the operator assessment exam is no walk in the park, even now. All they lack is combat experience, so they'll catch up in no time.
attributes.name: Rangers

attributes.content: So, anyone among them with notable combat skills?
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Hmm... Can't say I've kept up with that myself. Though I can help you ask around. But why?
attributes.name: Rangers

attributes.content: ...You know that my blade is broken.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Oh, yes. I remember now, you were chopping metal crabs left and right. You even asked Noir Corne for a spare.
attributes.name: Rangers

attributes.content: Perhaps you can pay Logistics another visit for a replacement, or look for Vulcan to make you a new custom weapon. I'm sure she'd be happy to help.
attributes.name: Rangers

attributes.content: Or could it be that... you're looking for a disciple to pass your old blade on to, as a token?
attributes.name: Rangers

attributes.content: Hahaha, don't mind this old man and his jests—
attributes.name: Rangers

attributes.content: Ha... ha... that can't be it, right...?
attributes.name: Rangers

attributes.content: I did have something like that in mind.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: But, Yato... that makes no sense.
attributes.name: Rangers

attributes.content: I know... I'm not an instructor, and I wouldn't know how to teach anyone anyway. Besides, would they ever have need of it?
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Forget it, it's nothing. I'll need to think about this more.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Yato... Now this is a rare sight.
attributes.name: Rangers

attributes.content: So this blade of yours... considering its age and the number of past repairs, it's impossible to restore it to a usable state.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: After applying for equipment scrapping, you have two choices: apply for a standard new blade from Logistics, or contact me for a custom make if you have any special requirements. You just have to fill out the right form.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: But it seems to me this blade means something special to you.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: It's the first blade I received after arriving on Rhodes Island. It was smelted with fragments of my blade from my Higashi days.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: So it's been reforged before... I see, so that's why it's somewhat weak.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: It was already broken when it was passed down to me from my swordplay teacher, before it became this.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: It's a little strange, but I've been away from my homeland for so long, and yet even now I still recall its history when I look at this... That's what made me want to keep it.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: That's unfortunate. So that's why you're at such a loss as to what to do with it.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: Alright, I respect your traditions, but I have to say that realizing your wish will be difficult, at least in the short term. Accepting a disciple to pass down your blade won't be a simple affair.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: Besides, it isn't really usable anymore, so I doubt anyone on Rhodes Island would want it.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: To be honest, I never thought this day would come. I thought it would outlive me, or at worst break in battle.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: But you're right... I should just give up on this.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Hmm... If you still want to use it, I do have a method we can try, although it's an old technique.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: You could have the blade reforged anew, but it'll become even weaker and more brittle. I wouldn't recommend it for high intensity combat.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: It's up to you.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: Understood... I'll need to think it over.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Got distracted again...
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: You... Why is this one blade making you so uneasy, Yato?
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Sorry to disturb you, Yato, ma'am.
...You were looking for me?
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Yes.
And you are?
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: I'm Celine, Celine Freeman. I'm currently interning at Field Operations, and aiming to become a Vanguard Operator.
And what business do you have with me?
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: (Breathes deeply)
attributes.name: Celine

attributes.content: Sorry, I overheard your conversation with Rangers earlier. That you're looking for someone to spar with. So... I'd like to have a match with you.
attributes.name: Celine

attributes.content: You want to spar with me?
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Um, yes... I want to win the right to learn from you.
attributes.name: Celine

attributes.content: Celine... She actually went to find Yato!
attributes.name: Intern Operator B

attributes.content: Surely she hasn't forgotten what happened when she went looking for Flamebringer? She's been acting so strange ever since she failed the exam in swordsmanship class.
attributes.name: Intern Operator C

attributes.content: She might as well have 'I must prove myself' written on her face, seeing how stubborn she is. I hear Yato's pretty blunt though, so she probably wouldn't agree to—
attributes.name: Intern Operator B

attributes.content: Sure.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Huh?!
attributes.name: Intern Operator B

attributes.content: I'll make sure not to go overboard...
attributes.name: Celine

attributes.content: No need.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Alright then... here I come!
attributes.name: Celine

attributes.content: (She, she dodged?)
attributes.name: Celine

attributes.content: Behind.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: (She's so fast, but I can keep up...)
attributes.name: Celine

attributes.content: Aha!
attributes.name: Celine

attributes.content: Did you catch that?
attributes.name: Intern Operator B

attributes.content: Uh... No.
attributes.name: Intern Operator C

attributes.content: When did Yato's blade... end up at Celine's throat?
attributes.name: Intern Operator B

attributes.content: You lose.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Ma'am, I... I want another try!
attributes.name: Celine

attributes.content: ...Come.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: (That move didn't work earlier, so maybe this one will...)
attributes.name: Celine

attributes.content: Heh!
attributes.name: Celine

attributes.content: Hmm... You lose. Again.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: (How can this be? I definitely dodged her attack, so she should have missed me!)
attributes.name: Celine

attributes.content: (But this blade... is right here again...)
attributes.name: Celine

attributes.content: Let's call it a day.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: No, wait... Yato, please let me try again! One last time!
attributes.name: Celine

attributes.content: You're no match for me.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: I... I won't lose this time!
attributes.name: Celine

attributes.content: Then come at me.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: ...Thank you.
attributes.name: Celine

attributes.content: (I know how she fights, so if I move like Flamebringer did back then, I'll definitely...)
attributes.name: Celine

attributes.content: Hup—!
attributes.name: Celine

attributes.content: Hmm?
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: I... lost again.
attributes.name: Celine

attributes.content: The disparity... is huge.
attributes.name: Intern Operator C

attributes.content: Even her sword was knocked away. Yato really is ruthless.
attributes.name: Intern Operator B

attributes.content: You dropped your blade.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: You... should practice more diligently with your instructors.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Hmm...
attributes.name: Rangers

attributes.content: Hmf... *snore*...
attributes.name: Durin

attributes.content: I lose.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Judging from the situation on the table, it seems our winner is...
attributes.name: Rangers

attributes.content: Three times in a row? Your luck's pretty good today.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Did you switch to a new mask today, Noir Corne?
attributes.name: Rangers

attributes.content: Yeah, I broke the previous one in battle, remember? So I sent it in for repairs—
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Wait, no! It's not like I switched out my mask to change my luck! I wouldn't do anything like that!
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Yes, yes. Same rules as always: whoever loses treats the others. And I lost. So what does everyone want?
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Dry martini as usual.
attributes.name: Rangers

attributes.content: Durin... never mind. I'll get her a glass of fresh pressed juice.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Then, I also want a glass of—
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: One dry martini, one fresh pressed juice, and two Waters of Life mixed with vanilla soda, thank you.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Noir Corne? Didn't you yell 'I won't drink another drop of cactus juice, I need a Water of Life with vanilla soda before I die!' while being chased by metal crabs, so why—
attributes.name: Rangers

attributes.content: What are you guys talking about? Water of Life with vanilla soda, right? I already ordered one for you.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Hah. Okay.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Phew... Strange, Yato's drinking too.
attributes.name: Durin

attributes.content: Yato. Are you still worrying about your blade?
attributes.name: Rangers

attributes.content: It's fine.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: I heard you sparred with a kid in the Training Room today. How was she?
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: So-so. Good fundamentals, but too hasty with offense. And lacking experience to boot.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: *Sigh* I look away for just a moment and Yato gets into another fight.
attributes.name: Rangers

attributes.content: I asked around after I got back. The youngster's called... uh... Celine, I believe. She's actually considered one of the best among her peers.
attributes.name: Rangers

attributes.content: So if she didn't impress, the rest won't either. I suppose passing down your blade won't be easy.
attributes.name: Rangers

attributes.content: Oh, Celine. I know her. I've brought her along to simulation training once or twice.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: What did you think of her?
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: About the same as you, she's too hasty. She trains real hard and has a good head on her, but her performance in actual combat is all wack.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: She's introverted, hates admitting defeat, bad at asking for advice, and always stubbornly insists on running out on her own.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: There's something special about her. During our sparring matches, one of her moves resembled one that Flamebringer guy uses. I heard later that she's also sparred with him.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Yeah, she's a kid whose strengths and weaknesses are both obvious, and every instructor she's had has told her the same.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: *sigh* She knows it herself, but her self-esteem takes a hit every time she meets a setback, which just makes her even more anxious and prevents her from moving forward.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: What a shame...
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Don't you think she resembles you from back then, Yato?
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: No, not at all.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Sorry to interrupt, but there's something I've been wondering. Besides the tradition of passing down your blade to a disciple, is there any other reason you want to do this?
attributes.name: Rangers

attributes.content: Other reason? Why do you ask?
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Haha, forgive an old man's ramblings, but we're all employees here, and the youngsters are our colleagues receiving professional training. So there's no particular need to do this sort of thing.
attributes.name: Rangers

attributes.content: Vulcan said something similar. I thought it over, and there really isn't a reason to. I'd even prefer it if this blade weren't needed at all...
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: I did something else this morning. I went to HR to request more manpower, and was told that the rookies aren't up to standards yet, and can't join our Reserve Op Team.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: So what we discussed before, about getting more people, won't be happening. Most likely we'll have to handle all the work ourselves for the time being.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: That's how we've always done things, so I have no complaints. I'm sure the others feel the same.
attributes.name: Rangers

attributes.content: I know, but...
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Corne, how many stitches did you get from this last mission?
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Five... no, six...
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: And the old injury on your shoulder flared up three times, old timer. Think I didn't know?
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: It's true.
attributes.name: Rangers

attributes.content: Durin has lost several sleeping bags too. Even though our missions have only gotten more arduous, I'm sure we can manage. But for how long?
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: That's why I've been thinking about this blade. If we can find a suitable sprout to help with our work, then it won't be a complete waste of time.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Or to put it another way, even if we're no longer here someday, this blade at least can remain...
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Yato...
attributes.name: Rangers

attributes.content: Hey, we completed the mission and actually managed to gather everyone for drinks for once, so why all the long faces?
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: There's booze, so drink up! All of us, together!
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Hear, hear! Let us drink.
attributes.name: Rangers

attributes.content: Cheers.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Uh... Sorry to spoil your fun, but I'm looking for Yato...
attributes.name: Intern Operator A

attributes.content: You're... the intern Operator from this morning.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Mandy!
attributes.name: Intern Operator A

attributes.content: Ah, yes. You. I remember.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Umm...
attributes.name: Intern Operator A

attributes.content: What are you so afraid of? Just say it!
attributes.name: Intern Operator B

attributes.content: So the thing is! I saw you and Celine sparring this morning! I... even though my current combat skills are far from adequate, I really want to learn from you.
attributes.name: Intern Operator A

attributes.content: Learn? From me?
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Yes! I'm really interested in the way you fight...
attributes.name: Intern Operator A

attributes.content: Sorry, but to be frank, I'm not even sure I know how to teach others. I don't have any experience in this area.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Hey, I've got a great idea!
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Yato, want to join me at my simulation training session tomorrow? We can go a round as a demonstration for the kids! I'm used to it.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Simulation training. So you mean... we just fight in front of them?
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Yeah, I do this all the time.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: So whenever I couldn't find you, it was because you were busy with simulation training?
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Ah, hehe...
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Ah... That would be wonderful!
attributes.name: Intern Operator A

attributes.content: I agree. It would also let you experience what it's like to teach.
attributes.name: Rangers

attributes.content: What do you think? Come on, Yato, consider it!
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: ...Fine, let's give it a try.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Shh. No talking, everyone. Noir Corne is speaking.
attributes.name: Intern Operator B

attributes.content: Mandy! Over here!
attributes.name: Intern Operator C

attributes.content: Coming, coming.
attributes.name: Intern Operator A

attributes.content: *ahem* Someone wasn't listening, so I'll repeat.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Our special guest for today's simulation training is Yato, my team leader.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Mhm.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Next up, I'll spar with her and demonstrate Op Team A4's combat style.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Alright, Yato. Let's go.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Right.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Noir Corne and Yato... I thought they were just going to act it out for us, but they're really fighting for real!
attributes.name: Intern Operator C

attributes.content: Can you handle it, Noir Corne?
attributes.name: Intern Operator C

attributes.content: Ha, ha, here I come!
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Hey!
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: (Noir Corne went all out with that. If it were me, I would try and dodge the strike, but Yato...)
attributes.name: Celine

attributes.content: (Whispering) Do you want to slow it down, so they can see it clearer?
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: (Whispering) Stay focused. And don't underestimate me, yeah?
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: (He blocked it head-on... Could it be that he intended to stop the opponent's attack trajectory?)
attributes.name: Celine

attributes.content: (They've distanced themselves again.)
attributes.name: Celine

attributes.content: Hah. I'm going to be serious now.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Take this!
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: (Yato has a methodical fighting style, so I should be able to predict...)
attributes.name: Celine

attributes.content: Whoops, I lose.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: (In that last move, Yato dodged Noir Corne's attack, and flanked him with just footwork.)
attributes.name: Celine

attributes.content: (She probably used the same method when she appeared behind me in our match...)
attributes.name: Celine

attributes.content: That was a simple encounter and confrontation, everyone. You guys catch that? You can watch the replay in the terminal if you didn't.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Alright, I'll be your opponent for the rest of this simulation training session— Huh, Yato?
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: I'll do it.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Wha?!
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Huh?!
attributes.name: Intern Operator B

attributes.content: I'll be everyone's opponent for the rest of today's session.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Wait, Yato—
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Is there a problem?
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: No, but simulation training comes with some rules.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Such as?
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: A reward. We always have some kind of reward here. So what kind of prize are you going to offer?
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: ...Just one hit.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: If anyone can land a single hit on me, I'll teach them everything I know about combat, full stop.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Wow...
attributes.name: Intern Operator B

attributes.content: Me! Yato, I'll do it!
attributes.name: Intern Operator A

attributes.content: Several hours later...
*sigh* I couldn't even last two moves.
attributes.name: Intern Operator B

attributes.content: Why are you sighing? Look at the others, two moves against her is plenty.
attributes.name: Intern Operator C

attributes.content: I already challenged her three times. I've watched so many records, but I still don't understand her fighting style...
attributes.name: Intern Operator A

attributes.content: Anyone else?
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Where's Celine? Has she actually not had a go yet?
attributes.name: Intern Operator C

attributes.content: If there's no one else, then let's call it here for today.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: I want to try.
attributes.name: Celine

attributes.content: (Tosses blade)
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Come.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Phew...
attributes.name: Celine

attributes.content: (She's still making the same moves flawlessly, and I can't tell which angle she'll attack from.)
attributes.name: Celine

attributes.content: (Better get ready... and wait for her to strike.)
attributes.name: Celine

attributes.content: So I take it you're letting me go first?
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: (I-I barely made it.)
attributes.name: Celine

attributes.content: (Focus everything into the blade, and confront it head-on... this method does seem to work.)
attributes.name: Celine

attributes.content: Very good.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: (I-Is she talking to me?)
attributes.name: Celine

attributes.content: I'll keep going.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: *cough*
attributes.name: Celine

attributes.content: (Dodged it... but there's a chance!)
attributes.name: Celine

attributes.content: (She got out of the way, she's way too fast...)
attributes.name: Celine

attributes.content: Celine and Yato have already exchanged three moves? You're not kidding?
attributes.name: Intern Operator C

attributes.content: She even retaliated once...
attributes.name: Intern Operator B

attributes.content: Shh, quiet! Look carefully. The way Celine's dodging is pretty similar to how Yato moved earlier.
attributes.name: Intern Operator A

attributes.content: She's not only adapting to her fighting rhythm, but actually learning it too...
attributes.name: Intern Operator A

attributes.content: Slow down.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: (Is she... giving me advice?)
attributes.name: Celine

attributes.content: (Alright, I managed to block the last few attacks.)
attributes.name: Celine

attributes.content: (I think I've got her attack rhythm down, so I'm sure I can... manage a counterattack.)
attributes.name: Celine

attributes.content: (It's time to try moving like she does.)
attributes.name: Celine

attributes.content: (Move out of the way, and then immediately strike with the blade just like she did—)
attributes.name: Celine

attributes.content: Heh.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Celine, she... landed a hit on Yato?!
attributes.name: Intern Operator A

attributes.content: No way?! Celine! You did it!
attributes.name: Intern Operator B

attributes.content: I! I did it? I did hit something, but...
attributes.name: Celine

attributes.content: You lose.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: What is... this floating down...?
attributes.name: Celine

attributes.content: A piece of cloth?
attributes.name: Celine

attributes.content: You have to switch between focusing on your blade or your opponent depending on the situation. You're still too hasty.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: ...Thank you.
attributes.name: Celine

attributes.content: But you did learn. I'm glad.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: I... No, I didn't...
attributes.name: Celine

attributes.content: Awesome! Celine! Great job out there!
attributes.name: Intern Operator A

attributes.content: Celine, you're amazing!
attributes.name: Intern Operator C

attributes.content: (It's rare to learn this much in such a short span of time... Celine... perhaps she makes the cut...)
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: That was crazy. Now I gotta work hard to reach Celine's level.
attributes.name: Intern Operator B

attributes.content: Yeah, I hope we can keep sparring with Yato...
attributes.name: Intern Operator C

attributes.content: Yato almost offers the blade once more, but her hand rests on the hilt as she looks at the Operators around her.
She sees several pairs of young eyes, all laser-focused on her.
She suddenly realizes it is she herself reflected in them.
Yato!
attributes.name: Celine

attributes.content: Is there something else?
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: I... Even though I lost, can... can I still fight you again next time? I really learned a lot from sparring with you.
attributes.name: Celine

attributes.content: Me too!
attributes.name: Intern Operator A

attributes.content: We want to continue practicing with you, Yato.
attributes.name: Intern Operator B

attributes.content: Listen up. I'll be here tomorrow and do some simulation training with everyone. Corne, there shouldn't be any problems with that, right?
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Shouldn't be more than filling in an application form. I'll take care of it.
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: I'll also bring a blade and leave it in the Training Room.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Noir Corne

attributes.content: Since no one could beat me today, I've decided...
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: From today onwards, as long as I'm here, anyone can pick up that blade to spar with me. I'll always be happy to oblige.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: I look forward to seeing you next time, Rhodes Island newcomers.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: So, you had a few rounds with those youths, then decided to smelt this blade away?
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: You could put it that way.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: You're planning to give your blade to one of the kids you've got your sights on? Wait, no... you wouldn't need to smelt it down for that.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: Mhm. This blade will still face combat.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Then I'll get the furnace burning, but remember what I told you...
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: Of course. 'Don't use it in high intensity combat.'
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: From now on it'll be left here at base, and only used for one battle, wielded by different hands.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: Until a distant future, when... perhaps a day when we are no longer here.
attributes.name: Yato

attributes.content: She watches the blade sink slowly into the forge, its structure as brilliant as the blazing sun, and gradually melt.
Finally, its shape is gone completely, leaving only a ball of red liquid.
Like fresh blood.
